parameter.name: customerId
parameter.description: Id of the customer.

parameter.name: lineItems
parameter.description: Array of contain item details.

parameter.name: ignoreAutoNumberGeneration
parameter.description: Ignore auto estimate number generation for this estimate. This mandates the estimate number. Allowed Values: true and false

parameter.name: send
parameter.description: Send the invoice to the contact person(s) associated with the estimate. Allowed Values: true and false

parameter.name: contactPersons
parameter.description: Array of contact person(s) for whom estimate has to be sent.

parameter.name: templateId
parameter.description: ID of the pdf template associated with the estimate.

parameter.name: estimateNumber
parameter.description: Estimate number if auto number generation is disabled.

parameter.name: referenceNumber
parameter.description: Reference number for the estimate.

parameter.name: date
parameter.description: The date the estimate is created.

parameter.name: expiryDate
parameter.description: Date the estimate is valid upto.

parameter.name: taxId
parameter.description: ID of the tax or tax group applied to the estimate (US Edition only).

parameter.name: taxAuthorityId
parameter.description: ID of the tax authority. Tax authority depends on the location of the customer. For example, if the customer is located in NY, then the tax authority is NY tax authority. (US Edition only).

parameter.name: taxExemptionId
parameter.description: ID of the tax exemption (US Edition only).

parameter.name: avataxUseCode
parameter.description: Used to group like customers for exemption purposes. It is a custom value that links customers to a tax rule (Avalara integration only).

parameter.name: avataxExemptNo
parameter.description: Exemption certificate number of the customer (Avalara integration only).

parameter.name: vatTreatment
parameter.description: VAT treatment for the invoice (UK Edition only).

parameter.name: exchangeRate
parameter.description: Exchange rate of the currency.

parameter.name: discount
parameter.description: Discount applied to the invoice. It can be either in % or in amount. e.g. 12.5% or 190.

parameter.name: isDiscountBeforeTax
parameter.description: Used to specify how the discount has to applied. Either before or after the calculation of tax.

parameter.name: discountType
parameter.description: How the discount is specified. Allowed values are entity_level or item_level. Allowed Values: entity_level and item_level.

parameter.name: salesPersonName
parameter.description: Name of the sales person.

parameter.name: customFields
parameter.description: Array of the custom fields for an estimate.

parameter.name: note
parameter.description: Note for an estimate.

parameter.name: terms
parameter.description: Terms and conditions for the estimate.

parameter.name: shippingCharge
parameter.description: Shipping charges applied to the invoice.

parameter.name: adjustment
parameter.description: Adjustments made to the invoice.

parameter.name: adjustmentDescription
parameter.description: Customize the adjustment description. E.g. Rounding off.
